items.preText: Tim: "I'd imagine Bangladesh would target 200 off 45, then try to get 45+ in the final 5 and hope that's enough given the difficulty chasing 200+ under lights in the UAE."
items.text: full toss dipping on the stumps, and he seemed to lose the length a bit. Stays in his crease and steers it to short third man

items.text: length ball on the stumps, he goes back in his crease to jab it to long-on

items.text: length ball on the stumps, punched to long-on off the back foot

items.text: fuller on the stumps, he comes forward and flicks it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: shorter one, on the stumps. He stays back and cuts it past point's right
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: fired into the stumps, but he pushes it into the midwicket area. No fielder so they can steal a second
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.preText:
Rashid back

Karnvir Bring : "A few questions to Afghanistan selectors... Why is Rashid Khan not opening the batting? It could be the x-factor to Afghanistan's batting success. And also talking about afghani openers.. where is hazratullah Zazai? He was absolutely sensational against Ireland in the t20i series (156 runs in 2 innings). Kind regards from a Afghanistan cricket fan..."
items.text: tossed up on offstump, glides it to short third man
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: defeats him with the drift and and hits him on the pads. Pitched outside leg though
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: almost stumped googly, and hits Mahmudullah on the thigh pad when he's come forward. Shahzad collects and breaks the stumps, but he got back
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: wallopped full ball and in the slot for a slog-sweep, executed perfectly, from down on one knee
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, SIX runs

items.text: stays back to flick through midwicket
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: turning in from offstump, he plays it away towards midwicket
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText:
Muhammad Hassan: "Why is Shapoor and Dawlat Zadran not playing in this Afghan Squad?Had the been in this bowling unit instead of Aftab and Naib the unit would have been more deadly and there would be no weak link in the unit"

Think Dawlat is unfit. Shapoor not selected
items.text: through him missed the full ball and it went past his bat, but past the stumps too

items.text: full toss, flicked away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: tries to paddle it but doesn't get enough on it. Straight to short fine leg. Kayes wanted the quick single but was sent back. The throw was too wide to have him in trouble
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: stays back and clips this length ball on the pads through midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: floated up full toss outside off, driven through the covers but not timed well
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: steps away and drives on the up through the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Saurabh: "This isn't T20 where bowler bowls just 4 overs and can get to opening.. This is ODI cricket. After being 50 overs on field and bowling 10 of them majorly towards the end of the innings they need rest. Rashid is no exception. Above that he's also a finisher not a bowler who can look through fresh opening spell when ball is new. "
items.text: misses the reverse sweep tried to smack it, but was hit on the pads. They appeal, but decide against a review
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: Rashid is under the pump here huge stride out and slog swept him over midwicket once again
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, SIX runs

items.text: strays on the pads, and he misses the flick, but Shahzad misses it too, allowing runs
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 2 leg byes

items.text: googly, but he stays back in his crease to punch it to cover
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full leg-break, he goes on the front foot to turn to short fine-leg. Quick single taken

items.text: googly, he stays back in his crease and turns it to square leg
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Hassan Hamayoun: "A victory for Bangladesh will make PAKvBAN more interesting.A fight for a place in the finals"
items.text: slower ball, floated outside off and turns into a full toss. square driven past point to raise a good fifty. He needed to guard against a collapse and he's done that.
